data.eml:eml: A re-appraisal of the systematics of the African genus Chamaeleo (Reptilia: Chamaeleonidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tilbury, Colin R., Tolley, Krystal A. (2009): A re-appraisal of the systematics of the African genus Chamaeleo (Reptilia: Chamaeleonidae). Zootaxa 2079: 57-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.187324
